title: 拳头公司完成了对Hypixel工作室的收购
author: Y制杖杖
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Y制杖杖 于 2020-4-17 08:15 编辑 

原文：https://www.riotgames.com/en/new ... res-hypixel-studios

April 16, 2020 -- LOS ANGELES AND DERRY~LONDONDERRY, NORTHERN IRELAND -- Riot Games, the game developer and publisher best known for League of Legends, today completed its acquisition of Hypixel Studios. Founded in 2018 with support from an advisory ** angel investors, including Riot Games, Hypixel Studios is currently developing Hytale, a community-powered block game that combines the scope of a creative sandbox with the depth of a roleplaying game.
拳头公司（Riot Games）是以英雄联盟为代表作的著名游戏开发商和发行商，于今天完成了对Hypixel工作室的收购。
Hypixel Studios成立于2018年，在Riot Games等投资者的支持下，目前正在开发Hytale。
Hytale是一款社区驱动的方块游戏，将创意沙盒与角色扮演广泛而深度地结合。 

Hytale官网：https://www.hytale.com/
官网资讯：
Hypixel Studios is being acquired by Riot Games as an independent studio.
